title: Why Citizen Science Matters in Kenya
author: @achieng
excerpt: Citizen science is a powerful tool for democratizing research. At Dadisi Labs, we are opening science to everyone.
content: Citizen science involves public participation in scientific research. In Kenya, Dadisi Labs is pioneering new ways for schools and communities to engage directly with research and innovation...

title: Training Teachers for STEM Education
author: @jane
excerpt: Teachers are the foundation of future innovation. Our workshops equip them with modern tools for STEM education.
content: Dadisi Labs believes in empowering teachers through workshops that provide hands-on training in lab techniques and innovative learning models...

title: Inside the Dadisi Mobile Lab
author: @david
excerpt: Our mobile lab brings STEM directly to schools and communities outside Nairobi.
content: With equipment like microscopes, incubators, and portable lab kits, the Dadisi mobile lab provides hands-on experience to learners across Kenya...
